abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center concert by Orion String Quartet at Rose Studio.

headline.main: Review: The Orion Quartet Plays Kirchner, Disguised as Bartok

keywords.value: Rose, Daniel and Joanna S, Studio (Manhattan, NY)
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: This string quartet performed a survey of Leon Kirchner’s complete quartets at the Rose Studio, presented by the Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center.
lead_paragraph: This string quartet performed a survey of Leon Kirchner’s complete quartets at the Rose Studio, presented by the Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center.
